sense.gloss: contempt, scorn, disdain, despising, looking down on, slighting

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を|↑軽蔑|↑↓けいべつ↓するべきではない。
sdata.e: You shouldn't look down on him.

sdata.e: The rich are apt to look down on people.
